DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate long-term safety of growth hormone replacement in adult patients with growth hormone deficiency
DOC.brief_title: Extension Study on Safety of Long-Term Growth Hormone Replacement in Adult Patients With Growth Hormone Deficiency
DOC.criteria: Having completed the preceding longterm study of growth hormone replacement in adult patients diagnosed with growth hormone deficiency. Other pituitary hormone deficiencies being replaced if appropriate With severe impairments of cardiac, pulmonary, renal or hepatic functions With severe psychological disorders With malignant cancer With hypertension uncontrolled With diabetes mellitus
